# Programming concepts

> Documentation for Programming concepts.

- [Caller Information](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/caller-information.md): Learn more about: Caller Information (Visual Basic)
- [Collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/collections.md): Learn more about: Collections (Visual Basic)
- [Programming concepts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/index.md): Learn more about: Programming Concepts (Visual Basic)
- [Iterators](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/iterators.md): Learn more about: Iterators (Visual Basic)
- [Object-oriented programming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/object-oriented-programming.md): Learn more about: Object-oriented programming (Visual Basic)
- [Reflection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/reflection.md): Learn more about: Reflection (Visual Basic)

## Subtopics

- [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/llms.txt): 13 topics; Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await documentation and reference.
- [Attributes overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/attributes/llms.txt): 6 topics; Attributes overview documentation and reference.
- [Covariance and Contravariance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/llms.txt): 7 topics; Covariance and Contravariance documentation and reference.
- [Expression Trees](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/expression-trees/llms.txt): 6 topics; Expression Trees documentation and reference.
- [Language-Integrated Query (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/llms.txt): 55 topics; Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) documentation and reference.
- [Serialization Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/serialization/llms.txt): 3 topics; Serialization Docs documentation and reference.
